categories: Category:Star Wars: The New Jedi Order

nodes.text: The New Jedi Order: Star by Star (Talking Book Publishers Inc. audiobook)

The New Jedi Order: Star by Star is the unabridged audiobook version of the Star Wars Legends novel of the same name, by author Troy Denning. The audiobook was performed by David Hartley-Margolin and released by Talking Book Publishers Inc. in 2012.
